text: 24.30: Dan 7.13 naŋga, Sek 12.10-14 naŋga, Mk 13.26 naŋga, Sk 1.7 naŋga, 6.12-13Kandɨtɨwɨmi hañɨ Krundu Ñɨŋi hamandu muhɨm nzihɨ ihumbɨsa nɨmbu yɨvurahɨmandɨ. Kamati krunavundi sɨhanaŋga pɨrɨ nɨñɨndu nɨŋɨnɨŋ kambirɨhɨrɨmandɨyu. Kamata ŋgɨtu Krundu Ñɨŋi hama, ihumbɨsa nɨmbu kɨta nuŋandɨ tɨkatɨka naŋga sɨña aru naŋga ihumukɨrɨ humbañɨ payɨmandɨ.
